about_the_game:
PLAYTEST NOW AVALIABLE!

At launch, Magical Massage will not be available in English. However, I’ll monitor the number of wishlists and prioritize translating into the languages with the highest demand. Make sure to add the game to your wishlist to show your interest!

Summary

Magical Massage is a dark humor visual novel about curing the embarrassing ailments of magicians. From hemorrhoids that cause earthquakes, sweat pouring like a flood, to rhinitis that makes flaming nostrils...nothing too fancy that you can't handle. However, if your skills fall short, these powerful, unclothed magicians may kill you.

As story develops, watch the seeds of pain bloom into flowers of scars before your eyes, revealing the unpleasant truth of the world through youthful flesh.

How to play

  • Magical Massage: Choose the appropriate massage spot and pressure based on the magicians' reactions. Reckless touching of sensitive parts will cost you heavily.

  • Hypnotic Guidance: Respond intelligently to the hypnotized magician's nonsensical ramblings. (“I'm going to lead a human-to-fish revolution!”)

  • Stock Management: Stay up to date with current affairs, track market trends, and budget wisely to stock fragrance powder and essential oils.

  • Work Hard, Play Hard: Take a walk in the neighborhood, work on self-improvement, or go on vacations. Limitless opportunities to bond with your (clothed) clients.

Warning

The game contains disturbing content, including but not limited to:

  • Sensual touching

  • Discrimination and exploitation of fictional groups

  • Emotional manipulation in a hypnotic state

  • Abnormal psychology and aggressive behavior

  • Depictions of mass-casualty event

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains textual description of extremely traumatic experiences and disturbing memories.

name: 按魔大师 Magical Massage
short_description: Enjoy magician's look of agony and cure embarrassing ailments! From hemorrhoids that cause earthquakes, sweat pouring like a flood, to rhinitis that makes flaming nostrils...nothing too fancy that you can't handle. However, if your skills fall short, these powerful, unclothed magicians may kill you.
